recipe.ingredients: - tilapia fillets: 4 (each 6 ounces) - olive oil: 2 tablespoons - garlic (minced): 3 cloves - lemon juice: 2 tablespoons - dried parsley: 1 teaspoon - black pepper: 1/2 teaspoon - salt: 1/4 teaspoon - lemon (sliced, for garnish): 1
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Marinade: In a small bowl, combine olive oil, minced garlic, lemon juice, dried parsley, salt, and black pepper. 2. Marinate Fish: Place tilapia fillets in a shallow dish. Pour the marinade over the fish and gently rub it on both sides. Let it marinate for 15 minutes. 3. Preheat Grill: Heat your grill to medium-high heat. 4. Grill Tilapia: Place the tilapia fillets on the grill. Cook for about 3-4 minutes on each side or until the fish flakes easily with a fork. 5. Serve: Remove tilapia from the grill, garnish with lemon slices, and serve immediately.
